DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this prospective randomized controlled trial was to compare intensive insulin therapy with a carbohydrate restrictive strategy in patients with acute ischemic stroke evaluating the outcome through the Glasgow Outcome Scale Extended, hospital mortality and NIHSS during the ICU stay.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Strategies for Glycemic Control in Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Adult patients with acute ischemic stroke defined as: Abrupt onset of focal neurologic deficit No evidence of intracranial hemorrhage at noncontrasted CT scan. Age below 18 Pregnancy
